name: Harvest (itch) (FinGames)
description:
Harvest is a game made by FinGames for LudumDare 44.

In this game you play as a reaper who has been tasked by Death to collect souls to gain your freedom and escape the endless torment.

This game was made by FinGames and we would love to get some feedback.

The game is designed for resolution 1920x1080.
